titleStmt.title: A Strange banquet, or, The Devils entertainment by Cook Laurel at the Peak in Devonshire with a true relation of the severall dishes : the tune is, Cook Laurel.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Ben Jonson.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
